text:
John Willard Vogt (December 28, 1936 – March 21, 2018) was an American engineer and politician. He was born in Lake Wales, Florida. He studied at the University of Florida. He served in the Florida Senate from 1972 to 1988. Vogt was a member of the Democratic Party.
Vogt died on March 21, 2018 at the age of 81 from pulmonary fibrosis in Tallahassee, Florida.
